title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 43.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 43.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part governs: (a) the use of market-value adjustment formulae in determining cash surrender benefits and policy loan values under individual policies or certificates of life insurance that provide for the crediting of additional amounts pursuant to section
4232 (b)
or
4518
of the Insurance Law; (b) advertising and disclosure relating to such market-value adjustments; (c) filing requirements for such policies and certificates; (d) mandatory provisions to be contained in such policies and certificates; and
(e) funding and reserve requirements for such policies and certificates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
43.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
